column4: Hi, I downloaded the musicbrainz VM and following the instructions here: http://musicbrainz.org/doc/MusicBrainz_Server/Setup
I'm trying to get the IP address of my vm
if I check with ifconfig, this is what I get for eth0 inet addr: fe80::a00:27ff:fe88:b42a/64
if nobody helps I would try ##linux not sure really. :)
